## onSnapshot() function

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export function onSnapshot<T>(
  reference: DocumentReference<T>,
  options: SnapshotListenOptions,
  onNext: (snapshot: DocumentSnapshot<T>) => void,
  onError?: (error: FirestoreError) => void,
  onCompletion?: () => void
): () => void;
```
